title: Businesses Are Cashing In on Trump’s Tax Cuts
summary: Corporate tax revenue has quickly dipped since Republicans passed tax cuts this summer. But economists think these tax breaks might be worth it.

title: Behind the Supreme Court’s Push to Expand Presidential Power
summary: For more than a decade, the Supreme Court’s conservative majority has chipped away at Congress’s power to insulate independent agencies from politics. Now, the court has signaled its willingness to expand presidential power once again.

title: Trump Commuted David Gentile’s Sentence. His Victims Are Seething.
summary: David Gentile spent just days in prison for his conviction in what prosecutors described as a $1.6 billion scheme that defrauded thousands of investors.

title: A Seized Oil Tanker Off Venezuela and the Big Business of Dark Fleet Smuggling
summary: The U.S. seizure of a vessel off Venezuela is likely to squeeze the country’s government, but do little to counter the tankers that secretively move oil from sanctioned countries.

title: What to Know About Trump’s Seizure of an Oil Tanker Near Venezuela
summary: The tanker was headed eastward and had recently carried Iranian oil. The seizure is an escalation in President Trump’s military pressure campaign against Venezuela’s leader, Nicolás Maduro.

title: Troops Involved in Boat Strikes Face a ‘Moral Injury’ Risk, Experts Say
summary: Troops who play a part in deadly missions that they see as wrong or unjustified may suffer deep psychological harm as a result, research has shown.

title: China Is Getting Much of What It Wants From the U.S., Including Chips
summary: For China, President Trump’s moves to loosen chip controls, soften U.S. rhetoric and stay silent on tensions with Japan amount to a rare string of strategic gains.

title: Historic Shift Underway in China’s Economy as Investment Slump Deepens
summary: Investment in manufacturing, infrastructure and property is expected to fall this year, a remarkable turn for an economy whose growth reshaped the world.

title: Democrats Release New Epstein Photos Documenting Ties to Trump, Clinton and Others
summary: The images, released without context by Democrats on the Oversight Committee, reveal little new about the deceased sex offender’s ties to prominent men in politics, entertainment and finance.

title: Kids Rarely Read Whole Books Anymore. Even in English Class.
summary: When teachers do assign whole books, they often choose from a stagnant list of classics.

title: How Matt Dinniman’s ‘Dungeon Crawler Carl’ Became a Blockbuster
summary: Matt Dinniman introduced his series about an alien reality TV show free on the web. But readers ate up the goofy humor, now to the tune of 6 million books sold.

title: Ukrainians, Worrying More About Power Cuts, See U.S. Peace Push as Just Noise
summary: Many understand the dance their leaders must perform to appease President Trump. But that doesn’t make them any less weary of the rounds and rounds of talks.

title: How Power Cuts Are Affecting Ukrainians
summary: Russia has been targeting energy infrastructure in Ukraine, leaving multiple cities without electricity. Kim Barker, who’s been covering the war, gives us a glimpse into the daily life of Ukrainians living with power cuts.

title: How Ukraine Has Responded to Trump’s Peace Plan and Russia’s Demands for Territory
summary: A Ukrainian peace plan, sent this week to Washington, pushes back against President Trump’s proposal that Ukraine give up more land for peace.

title: Russia Sues Holder of Frozen Assets Europe Wants for Ukraine Loan
summary: The lawsuit was a warning to European officials who are racing to agree to a plan to use Russian government assets in Europe to lend money to Ukraine.

title: Elon Musk Tests Europe’s Willingness to Enforce Its Online Laws
summary: Backed by White House officials, the tech billionaire has lashed out at the European Union after his social media platform X was fined last week.

title: Paramount Says Money Is No Object. Warner Bros. Isn’t Convinced.
summary: Larry Ellison is backstopping Paramount’s bid for Warner Brothers, but Warner Brothers is concerned that the billionaire has not provided a personal guarantee to pay.

title: Record Flooding Forces Rescues Across Western Washington
summary: A major river in the region was set to crest on Friday morning, with more rain on the way.

title: Harold Hamm, Oklahoma Oil Tycoon, Allies With Trump to Reshape U.S. Energy
summary: Harold Hamm, an Oklahoma oil tycoon, has played a central role in reshaping energy policy by allying himself with President Trump.

title: Soon He’ll Be Mayor Mamdani. To His Soccer Teammates, He Was Just Z.
summary: Zohran Mamdani isn’t just a superfan. Until recently, he was a key player on the Talking Headers, a rec-league team in Brooklyn.

title: Review of Medical Cannabis Use Finds Little Evidence of Benefit
summary: Researchers found a chasm between the health reasons for which the public seeks out cannabis and what gold-standard science actually shows about its effectiveness.

title: Does Paramount’s David Ellison Know What He’s Doing?
summary: David Ellison is cozying up to Trump in his effort to save Hollywood. It’s a risky strategy for our democracy.

title: Why Is It So Hard to Build Big Things?
summary: Today we look at the state of American inertia.

title: How Philadelphia is Addressing Crime and Safety Through Environmental Design
summary: Environmental design interventions play a subtle role in helping the city reduce gun violence.

title: Tech Support Scammers Stole $85,000 From Him. His Bank Refused a Refund.
summary: A retired lawyer lost the money in a tech support scam, a type of online fraud that is surging. Citibank said it couldn’t recover the funds, which criminals wired from inside his account.

title: A Trickle of Aid Reaches a Captured, War-Ravaged City in Sudan
summary: A local group negotiated permission from the paramilitary force controlling El Fasher, offering a rare glimpse into conditions after a massacre.

title: King Charles to Speak About His Cancer in Televised Message
summary: A video of the king discussing his “recovery journey” will air on Channel 4 on Friday as part of a national cancer awareness campaign in the U.K.
